website_summaries.verdict: A set of very wide gently sloping stairs for your aboveground pool entry.
pros: Works well as a comfortable way to exit your pool
Made from a plastic material that won't rust
Includes deck brackets for attaching to your pool deck
Fill with sand to add weight
cons: These steps are lightweight and can float if you don't fill with sand or put extra weight on them

customer_reviews.title: Step rise is too high!!! Not usable for people with weak or problem knees!
customer_reviews.text: These steps are sturdy, but the rise on each step is much too high!! It's about 12 inches rather than 7 inches for a normal step. I've had to put concrete stepping stones on one side of the steps to make them usable for myself and my friends. I would say these are only usable for people who are in good physical condition with no knee problems!!
customer_reviews.author: chris robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These steps were very easy to assemble and place into the pool with the help of one other person. They worked real well for my wife who had trouble climbing up a ladder. Steps seem to be very sturdy and durable. The price was very reasonable also. Very glad we purchased the steps because of the convenience they gave us.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Deffenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Nice steps but don't pay extra for the mat. Buy it separately!
customer_reviews.text: The steps are a very nice compliment to the pool. They arrived quickly and in new condition but I was very disappointed with the assembly instructions and the extra 36$ I paid for a wrong size liner mat included. It is only about 18x30 which is not big enough to cover the entire bottom of steps. I Added 125 lbs of sand in canopy weights underneath steps and it still could use 25 more.
customer_reviews.author: pauliep

customer_reviews.title: Went together easily with easy to follow directions
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was a wreck but due to UPS mishandling not the vendor. Went together easily with easy to follow directions. Also included was a liner mat. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So far, we are very please with these steps. They do not flat if you fill them all the way with sand. You have to continue filling and knocking the sand down until it fills all the posts including the smaller ones.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and install. Has held together well and dogs use it as well to enter and exit pool.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: What a total piece of crap. What a joke trying to get the two feet to stay secured, get the thing stable etc. It's rubbish. My husband had to make so many modifications to make these stair semi functional. Do yourself a favour, buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lovoni Walker

customer_reviews.title: Requires Jerry Rigging
customer_reviews.text: The pool steps float. We had to add 5 pvc pipes with zip ties to keep them from rising up. They are narrower than I thought and my dogs struggle getting up them.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my above ground pool as replacement for other steps. Durable and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: J Adams

customer_reviews.title: These steps are fantastic. Work well in my pool
customer_reviews.text: These steps are fantastic. Work well in my pool. I bought the weights to fill with sand to attach and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Romano

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get in and out by the older people over 25.
customer_reviews.text: Have Had this product a little over two years and it functions property, was easy to assemble, is sturdy, and adds charm.
customer_reviews.author: IKJLM

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a good product
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Sturdy and liked that included the pad. Helps my daughter be able to enter and exit much easier than the ladder did. we filled it with play sand and it does not move or float around at all. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: april lee

customer_reviews.title: Like the steps very much.
customer_reviews.text: I can get in the pool again with these steps. My knees could not handle the ladder. Wish the were a little more sturdy feeling but so far no problem at all. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rod Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Functional but a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: Functional but a little flimsy. We have put sand into the railings for ballast to keep it from moving so much
customer_reviews.author: Charles E.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with these pool stairs,was looking for a while and they are very sturdy and wide for everyone ....
customer_reviews.author: Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great step for our above ground pool, really has held up with all the people .
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: The idea was to have a convenient easy stairway out of the pool
customer_reviews.text: The idea was to have a convenient easy stairway out of the pool. No mention of sand was mentioned in the add. The arm rails seem not so ... strong . Yes the stairs work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Splash Net Express Blue Wave Easy Pool Step for Above-Ground Pools
product_meta.description: The Easy Pool Step from Blue Wave makes getting in and out of your swimming pool a breeze! This rugged pool step is made from maintenance-free polyethylene and will fit any above-ground pool up to 54in in depth! The double handrails and wide, slip-resistant steps make an easy exit for young and elderly swimmers alike. This step system is perforated to allow water and chemical circulation and eliminate a dead water area where algae can grow. The patented design allows for easy installation and removal of the ballast weight for off-season winterization. Easy Pool Steps top flanges anchor securely to any deck for a firm footing. In fact, the Easy Pool Step is designed to meet or exceed all NSPI standards for safety and swimmer entrapment. So add the ultimate in safety and convenience to your outdoor oasis with the Blue Wave Easy Pool Step.
